pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bivariate Probability Distributions // Convenience functions for plotting/evaluating bivariate (uniform, binomial, Poisson, categorical, normal and bimodal) distributions, trivariate (normal and Dirichlet) distributions, bivariate kernel density estimates and bivariate empirical cumulative distribution functions. Supports their probability mass functions (PMFs), probability density functions (PDFs) and cumulative distribution functions (CDFs), mostly where applicable.
